alert.note: Alert for Evans; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 30 at 5:05PM EST until December 30 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Tornado Warning for portions of... Evans County in southeastern Georgia... Tattnall County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 530 PM EST. * At 505 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Mendes, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include: Glennville and Mendes. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
